select new LoansBusiness_Typedto ( b.Code, b.Description, b.RelatedGLACode, b.Active, b.TS, b.CreatedDate, b.CreatedUserId, b.UpdatedDate, b.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00404 as b where b.Active = true
